content:
### Features

* **desktop:** new option in tray menu to toggle always on top.
* **inventory-optimizer:** new "items not used in any of your lists" optimizer.
* **tooltips:** added rlvl and quality to recipe details.


### Bug Fixes

* **core:** hide desktop tip banner on mobile.
* **db:** fixed items showing wrong value for Class/job.
* **db:** fixed progress value not shown on recipe details.
* **ios:** possible fix for older ios browsers.
* **list:** monster icon is now larger.
* **lists:** fixed "mark panel content as done" on offline lists.
* **simulator:** fixed a bug preventing custom rotations from saving.
* **simulator:** fixed rotation finder not loading and poor simulator perfs.
* **tooltips:** added 500ms delay before closing and they now stay opened on mouseover.

### Features

* **item-icons:** middle click or ctrl + click now opens a child window on desktop app.


### Bug Fixes

* **db:** fixed "craft in simulator" button not working as intended.
* **db:** fixed missing TOOLTIP.xxx translations.
* **desktop:** fixed zoom behavior and persistence.
* **gearset:** fixed gearset creation popup job select box.
* **i18n:** fixed koren names sometimes not displayed properly.
* **list:** fixed dungeon names sometimes including html tags.
* **profile:** fixed CN and KR characters not being added properly as custom characters.
* **search:** fixed island recipes not showing properly.
* **search:** fixed items with multiple recipes always showing them all.
* **tooltips:** fixed class/job value not accurate.
* **tooltips:** fixed some fish tooltips being way too long.

### Bug Fixes

* **desktop:** don't show outdated inventory warning on child windows.
* **list:** fixed list details not loading if you had a timer filter in layout.
* **profile:** Fix regression on character link popup.

### Features

* **core:** item tooltips now have more info and are way faster.
* **core:** new drag and drop implementation everywhere !.
* **data:** update for cn patch-6.38.
* **desktop:** offline search, way faster for everything !.
* **desktop:** you can now create child windows.
* **marketboard:** support for korean servers in marketboard-related features.
* **search:** brand new search API, faster than ever !.
* **search:** item results now show their sources directly in the search page.


### Bug Fixes

* **alarms:** fixed timer drifting name as it updates.
* **core:** don't show support popup on overlays and child windows.
* **island-workshop:** allowed better island state updating.
* **layout:** fixed housing vendors sometimes not prioritized properly.

### Features

* **aggregates:** you can now change the layout use din aggregates.
* **db:** support for new 6.45 content.


### Bug Fixes

* **rotation-folder:** remove permission level next to folder's name.

### Features

* **data:** update for cn patch-6.35.
* **db:** support for korean v6.31 update.
* **db:** support for new 6.45 content.


### Bug Fixes

* **accessibility:** add lang attribute to html.
* **i18n:** en language file.
* **lists:** fixed split removing items from list before confirmation.

### Features

* **db:** support for korean v6.3 update.


### Bug Fixes

* **autofill:** filling from purchased items now count as external rather than crafted.
* **db:** fixed wrong NPC source for Adaptive Fishing Reel Component.
* **gc-supply:** fixed wrong values for max lvl supplies.
* **list-details:** fixed selected layout not propagating to overlay.
* **step-by-step:** fixed island never detected properly in overlay.
* **step-by-step:** fixed selected layout not propagating to overlay.
* **voyage-tracker:** better display of submarine spots.

### Features

* **data:** update for cn patch-6.31.
* **gearsets:** new guides flagging system for guide editors.
* **rotations:** favorite rotation folders are now properly shown in rotations page.
* **simulator:** added support for new expert recipe Good Omen condition.


### Bug Fixes

* **collectables:** fixed exp computation issues.
* **core:** fixed patch notes slicer removing the last 3 lines.
* **db:** spawn radius now has a maximum value.
* **db:** updated GamerEscape icon.
* **gearset:** fixed an issue with tools sometimes accounted as 8 for no reason.
* **island-workshop:** fixed optimizer spam on some days.
* **island-workshop:** prevented a case where 22 hour schedules occured.
* **rotations:** fixed guide flag for editors not applied properly.
* **simulator:** copying a rotation from a guide won't make it undeletable anymore.
* **timers:** fixed tooltip sometimes not being updated properly.

### Features

* **db:** allagan reports import, mostly new fish info !.


### Bug Fixes

* **allagan-reports:** fixed list sometimes not refreshing properly.

### Features

* **db:** allagan reports import.


### Bug Fixes

* **island-sanctuary:** fixed wrong state reporting and broken planning for island level > 13.
